text: aur unamen kuchh log aise hai jo tumhaaree or kaan lagaate hai, yahaan tak ki jab ve tumhaare paas se nikalate hai to un logon se, jinhen gyaan pradaan hua hai kahate hai, "unhonne abhee-abhee kya kaha?" vahee ve log hai jinake dilon par allaah ne thappa laga diya hai aur ve apanee ichchhaon ke peechhe chale hai
